text: Me Amonia mɨsogha bar me abɨni, me Aroerɨn nguibar ekiamɨn ikegha me mɨsogha ghua Minitɨn nguibar ekiamɨn otogha, bar ghua Abel Keramimɨn dɨpamɨn tu. Me 20plan nguibabav sogha, me abɨragha bar me agɨfa. Kamaghɨra Israelia bar Amonia abɨnigha, aghumsɨzim me ganɨngizɨ, me ua me ko mɨsoghan ibura.
